system.description: 1/Resound, when an enemy collides with you, you may inflict violence against them.
system.flavor: Ashra are beings that have six arms and three heads, considered demigods in the sense that they are partly divine, thrown out of heaven for having drunk too much of Divine Shura, the drink of immortality from Heavenly Banana Trees. Ashra wander the world as antigods, wrathful eternally at heaven.
